verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> about at that time,<WH6256> that Judah<WH3063> departed<WH3381> from his brothers,<WH251> and visited<WH5186> a certain<WH376> Adullamite,<WH5726> whose name<WH8034> was Hirah.<WH2437>
And Judah<WH3063> saw<WH7200> there<WH8033> a daughter<WH1323> of a certain<WH376> Canaanite<WH3669> whose name<WH8034> was Shua;<WH7770> and he took<WH3947> her and went<WH935> in to her.
So she conceived<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son<WH1121> and he named<WH7121> <WH8034> him Er.<WH6147>
Then she conceived<WH2029> again<WH5750> and bore<WH3205> a son<WH1121> and named<WH7121> <WH8034> him Onan.<WH209>
And she bore<WH3205> still<WH5750> another<WH3254> son<WH1121> and named<WH7121> <WH8034> him Shelah;<WH7956> and it was at Chezib<WH3580> that she bore<WH3205> him.
Now Judah<WH3063> took<WH3947> a wife<WH802> for Er<WH6147> his first-born, and her name<WH8034> [was] Tamar.<WH8559>
But Er,<WH6147> Judah's first-born, was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord,<WH3068> so the Lord<WH3068> took<WH4191> his life.<WH4191>

Then Judah<WH3063> said<WH559> to Onan,<WH209> "Go<WH935> in to your brother<WH251>'s wife,<WH802> and perform<WH2992> your duty<WH2992> as a brother-in-law to her, and raise<WH6965> up offspring<WH2233> for your brother."

And Onan<WH209> knew<WH3045> that the offspring<WH2233> would not be his; so it came<WH1961> about that when<WH518> he went<WH935> in to his brother<WH251>'s wife,<WH802> he wasted<WH7843> his seed on the ground,<WH776> in order not to give<WH5414> offspring<WH2233> to his brother.
But what<WH834> he did<WH6213> was displeasing<WH7489> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord;<WH3068> so He took<WH4191> his life<WH4191> also.<WH1571>

Then Judah<WH3063> said<WH559> to his daughter-in-law Tamar,<WH8559> "Remain<WH3427> a widow<WH490> in your father's house<WH1004> until<WH5704> my son<WH1121> Shelah<WH7956> grows<WH1431> up"; for he thought,<WH559> "[I am afraid] that he too<WH1571> may die<WH4191> like his brothers.<WH251>" So Tamar<WH8559> went<WH1980> and lived<WH3427> in her father's house.<WH1004>

Now after a considerable<WH7235> time<WH3117> Shua's daughter,<WH1323> the wife<WH802> of Judah,<WH3063> died;<WH4191> and when the time<WH5162> of mourning<WH5162> was ended,<WH5162> Judah<WH3063> went<WH5927> up to his sheepshearers<WH6629> <WH1494> at Timnah,<WH8553> he and his friend<WH7453> Hirah<WH2437> the Adullamite.<WH5726>
And it was told<WH5046> to Tamar,<WH8559> "Behold,<WH2009> your father-in-law is going<WH5927> up to Timnah<WH8553> to shear<WH1494> his sheep.<WH6629>"

So she removed<WH5493> her widow's garments<WH899> and covered<WH3680> [herself] with a veil,<WH6809> and wrapped<WH5968> herself, and sat<WH3427> in the gateway<WH6607> of Enaim,<WH5879> which<WH834> is on the road<WH1870> to Timnah;<WH8553> for she saw<WH7200> that Shelah<WH7956> had grown<WH1431> up, and she had not been given<WH5414> to him as a wife.<WH802>
When Judah<WH3063> saw<WH7200> her, he thought<WH2803> she [was] a harlot,<WH2181> for she had covered<WH3680> her face.<WH6440>

So he turned<WH5186> aside<WH5186> to her by the road,<WH1870> and said,<WH559> "Here<WH3051> now,<WH4994> let me come<WH935> in to you"; for he did not know<WH3045> that she was his daughter-in-law. And she said,<WH559> "What<WH4100> will you give<WH5414> me, that you may come<WH935> in to me?"

He said,<WH559> therefore, "I will send<WH7971> you a kid<WH1423> <WH5795> from the flock.<WH6629>" She said,<WH559> moreover, "Will you give<WH5414> a pledge<WH6162> until<WH5704> you send<WH7971> [it?]"

And he said,<WH559> "What<WH4100> pledge<WH6162> shall I give<WH5414> you?" And she said,<WH559> "Your seal<WH2368> and your cord,<WH6616> and your staff<WH4294> that is in your hand.<WH3027>" So he gave<WH5414> [them] to her, and went<WH935> in to her, and she conceived<WH2029> by him.
Then she arose<WH6965> and departed,<WH1980> and removed<WH5493> her veil<WH6809> and put<WH3847> on her widow's garments.<WH899>

When Judah<WH3063> sent<WH7971> the kid<WH1423> <WH5795> by his friend<WH7453> the Adullamite,<WH5726> to receive<WH3947> the pledge<WH6162> from the woman's hand,<WH3027> he did not find<WH4672> her.

And he asked<WH7592> the men<WH376> of her place,<WH4725> saying,<WH559> "Where<WH346> is the temple<WH6945> prostitute<WH6945> who<WH1931> was by the road<WH1870> at Enaim<WH5879>?" But they said,<WH559> "There has been<WH1961> no<WH3808> temple<WH6945> prostitute<WH6945> here.<WH2088>"

So he returned<WH7725> to Judah,<WH3063> and said,<WH559> "I did not find<WH4672> her; and furthermore,<WH1571> the men<WH376> of the place<WH4725> said,<WH559> 'There has been<WH1961> no<WH3808> temple<WH6945> prostitute<WH6945> here.<WH2088>'"

Then Judah<WH3063> said,<WH559> "Let her keep<WH3947> them, lest<WH6435> we become<WH1961> a laughingstock.<WH937> After<WH2009> all,<WH2009> I sent<WH7971> this<WH2088> kid,<WH1423> but you did not find<WH4672> her."

Now it was about three<WH7969> months<WH2320> later that Judah<WH3063> was informed,<WH5046> "Your daughter-in-law Tamar<WH8559> has played<WH2181> the harlot,<WH2181> and behold,<WH2009> she is also<WH1571> with child<WH2030> by harlotry.<WH2183>" Then Judah<WH3063> said,<WH559> "Bring<WH3318> her out and let her be burned!<WH8313>"

It was while she was being brought<WH3318> out that she sent<WH7971> to her father-in-law, saying,<WH559> "I am with child<WH2030> by the man<WH376> to whom<WH834> these<WH428> things<WH428> belong." And she said,<WH559> "Please<WH4994> examine<WH5234> and see,<WH5234> whose<WH4310> signet<WH2368> ring<WH2858> and cords<WH6616> and staff<WH4294> are these<WH428>? "

And Judah<WH3063> recognized<WH5234> [them,] and said,<WH559> "She is more<WH4480> righteous<WH6663> than<WH4480> I, inasmuch<WH3588> <WH5921> <WH3651> as I did not give<WH5414> her to my son<WH1121> Shelah.<WH7956>" And he did not have<WH3045> relations<WH3045> with her again.<WH3254> <WH5750>
And it came<WH1961> about at the time<WH6256> she was giving<WH3205> birth,<WH3205> that behold,<WH2009> there were twins<WH9639> in her womb.<WH990>

Moreover, it took<WH1961> place<WH1961> while she was giving<WH3205> birth,<WH3205> one put<WH5414> out a hand,<WH3027> and the midwife<WH3205> took<WH3947> and tied<WH7194> a scarlet<WH8144> [thread] on his hand,<WH3027> saying,<WH559> "This<WH2088> one<WH2088> came<WH3318> out first.<WH7223>"

But it came<WH1961> about as he drew<WH7725> back<WH7725> his hand,<WH3027> that behold,<WH2009> his brother<WH251> came<WH3318> out. Then she said,<WH559> "What<WH4100> a breach<WH6556> you have made<WH6555> for yourself!" So he was named<WH7121> <WH8034> Perez.<WH6557>
And afterward<WH310> his brother<WH251> came<WH3318> out who<WH834> had the scarlet<WH8144> [thread] on his hand;<WH3027> and he was named<WH7121> <WH8034> Zerah.<WH2226>
